abstract: Stocks fall again on lower oil prices.
lead_paragraph: Shares edged lower in afternoon trading, weighed down by a slide in energy stocks as crude oil and natural gas prices fell.

headline.main: Market Follows a Decline in Energy Stocks
headline.print_headline: Market Veers Lower in Light Trading as Oil Dips Again

snippet: Shares edged lower in afternoon trading, weighed down by a slide in energy stocks as crude oil and natural gas prices fell.
